name: Spirited away!
description:
SPIRITED AWAY
  • 8 unoriginal microgames
  • 1 minute of gameplay
  • 10% or original vision
  • overscoped as crap

The instructions are in-game!

Uhh basically you are a spirit traveling between different microgame dimensions.   The end of a microgame is the beginning of the next.

Music from here: https://opengameart.org/content/retro-synthwave-loops

Sounds from freesound.org
